author: vmassol
msg: Make master build work again by adding the new jsp.jar jar for the framework/ project

author: vmassol
msg: - The framework/ project can now be built for Servlet API 2.4/JSP API 2.0
- We still need to implement support for the simulated URL (setURL()) in the Cactus HttpServletRequestWrapper for Servlet API 2.4
- Added new jsp.jar jar (the jakarta servletapi project has split the servlet-api jar in 2 : servlet-api and jsp-api)
- I still need to fix the master build to use the new jsp.jar jar

author: vmassol
msg: - Tuned text so that it works for any J2EE API
- Added required servlet.jar property in the framework build.properties sample

author: vmassol
msg: Started support for J2EE 1.4 in the framework/ project. It should not break building with 1.2 nor 1.3. It has not yet been tested with 1.4.

author: vmassol
msg: the servlet.jar jar now needs to be passed to the samples/ejb build too (the reason is that we're now using the jboss j2ee jar which doesn't contain the servlet api)
